relocation-in-turkey.title: Relocation in Turkey
relocation-in-turkey.subtitle: Comprehensive support for settling in Turkey - from visa to residence permit

whoIsThisFor.title: Who Is This For?
criteria: You've been accepted to a Turkish university and are moving within 4-8 weeks
You need visa, housing, bank account, and residence permit handled 'turnkey'
You don't want to run around government offices and risk fines for mistakes

expectedResults.title: What You'll Get
items: Visa obtained, legal entry to Turkey
Rental contract in your name with utilities set up
Turkish bank account opened, debit card in hand
Residence permit application submitted, status tracking included
Personal curator support for 30 or 60 days after arrival

weeks.activities: Document preparation and visa center appointment booking
Arrival in Turkey, SIM card, tax number (vergi numarası)
Housing search and rental contract signing, bank account opening
Residence permit package preparation and submission

weDo.title: We Do
items: Prepare all required documents and translations
Book visa appointment at the consulate
Find 3-5 housing options matching your criteria
Accompany you to the bank for account opening
Submit residence permit application to immigration
Track application status and notify you of updates

youDo.title: You Do
items: Provide required documents (passport, acceptance letter, etc.)
Attend visa appointment at the consulate
Choose housing from the options we provide
Sign rental contract and pay deposit
Provide bank documents and sign account forms
Attend biometric appointment for residence permit

risks.risk: Visa rejection due to incomplete documents
risks.mitigation: We pre-check all documents, provide sample letters, and prepare you for interview questions

risks.risk: Rental contract errors or unfavorable terms
risks.mitigation: All contracts are reviewed by our legal team before signing to protect your interests

risks.risk: Bank account limits for international students
risks.mitigation: We work with multiple banks and know their requirements for international students
We submit applications early and track status daily via the government portal

items.question: Can I get a visa without an income statement?
items.answer: Yes, for students we can use your acceptance letter and scholarship confirmation as proof of financial support.

items.question: What if my address changes after I get my residence permit?
items.answer: You must notify immigration within 20 days of moving. We'll help you update your registration at the new address.

items.question: Can I bring my family members?
items.answer: Yes, family members can apply for dependent residence permits. We handle the entire process for family reunification.

tr-yos-courses.title: TR-YÖS Courses
tr-yos-courses.subtitle: Professional preparation for Turkish university entrance exams

courseGoal.title: Course Goal
courseGoal.description: We'll prepare you for TR-YÖS to a score sufficient for admission to your target faculty.

items.title: Practice
items.description: 12 full mock exams with real exam conditions

items.title: Error Analysis
items.description: Personalized feedback on every test you take

items.title: Materials
items.description: Task bank with 500+ problems and detailed notes

formatSchedule.title: Format & Schedule
formatSchedule.format: Online or in-person, group (up to 10) or individual
formatSchedule.homework: Yes, with detailed review and feedback
formatSchedule.support: Between sessions via Telegram chat with instructors

items.question: How do I register for the TR-YÖS exam?
items.answer: Registration opens in February on university websites. We'll guide you through the entire registration process.

items.question: Can I retake the exam if I'm not satisfied with my score?
items.answer: Yes, you can take TR-YÖS at multiple universities. Each university has its own exam, so you have multiple chances.

items.question: Can I reschedule lessons if I have a conflict?
items.answer: Yes, with 24 hours notice. We'll find a makeup time that works for both you and the instructor.

sat-courses.title: SAT Courses
sat-courses.subtitle: Expert SAT preparation for international university admissions

courseGoal.title: Target Results
courseGoal.description: Focused on Digital SAT preparation with proven strategies for success.

items.title: Math
items.description: Algebra, geometry, data analysis, advanced math

items.question: How many times can I take the SAT?
items.answer: You can take the SAT as many times as you want. Most students take it 2-3 times to achieve their target score.

items.question: Can I change my test date?
items.answer: Yes, College Board allows date changes for a fee. We'll help you navigate the process and choose the best test date.

items.question: Do I need TOEFL/IELTS too?
items.answer: It depends on the university. Some accept high SAT Reading & Writing scores instead of separate English proficiency tests.

turkish-english-course.title: Turkish & English Courses
turkish-english-course.subtitle: Language courses for students and professionals

levels.outcome: Basic conversations, daily tasks, simple texts
Work meetings, academic discussions, complex texts
Native-like fluency, professional writing, nuanced expression

teachers.title: Methodology & Teachers
teachers.methodology: We use a communicative approach with real-world scenarios. Every lesson includes speaking practice, grammar in context, and cultural insights.

profiles.name: Ayşe Yılmaz
profiles.achievements: Native Turkish speaker, 10+ years teaching experience, TÖMER certified

profiles.name: John Smith
profiles.achievements: Native English speaker, CELTA certified, 8 years in Turkey

profiles.name: Mehmet Demir
profiles.achievements: Bilingual Turkish-English, MA in Linguistics, exam prep specialist

expectedResults.title: Results in 12 Weeks
skills: Open a bank account in Turkish
Read news articles and understand main ideas
Navigate daily life without translation apps

items.question: What if I miss a class?
items.answer: All lessons are recorded. You can watch the recording and we'll schedule a makeup if needed.

items.question: Can I freeze my course?
items.answer: Yes, you can freeze for up to 2 weeks. Just let us know in advance.

items.question: What's your refund policy?
items.answer: Full refund within first 2 lessons. After that, prorated refund for unused lessons.

document-translations.subtitle: Professional certified translations for official documents
